welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Burnham, a charming town known for its tranquil coast and rich history. We invite you to explore our beautiful city and immerse yourselves in all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly Star Alliance airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A major terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly Oneworld airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly SkyTeam airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The main terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly British Airways and Iberia.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport for 45 minutes, with options to purchase longer access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northolt Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Blackbushe Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Blackbushe Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for free.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Farnborough Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Farnborough Airport caters to private and executive flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminals.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Benson Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Benson Airport is used exclusively for military flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Luton Airport handles all commercial flights and offers a variety of amenities for passengers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Luton Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a more exclusive and personalized experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport for up to 4 hours.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London City Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private jet passengers, offering VIP services and amenities.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
